div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2371 Entremont (anc. oppidum of the Sal- luvii), near Aix, 1953 Burial: early 2nd cent. B.C. (Rolland) Contents: 105+ AR. From excavations Massalia: 2 dr. 100 ob. Roman Rep.: 2 vict. 1 quin. Disposition: Aix Beno√Æt, Gallia 1954, pp. 285-6 Rolland, RN 1956-7, p. 99, note 9 (mentions 3 dr. and 3 vict.) Crawford, RRCH 110
